title: Riot Kayle and icon at same time or no?
body: So I have received riot {{champion:10}} but no icon, I thought they were supposed to come at the same time or do I have it wrong?

replies.body: The gifts are being sent out individually and you may not get it all at the same time.  There may be a bit of time to finish sending everything out, but you can stay up to date on our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
